svg.text: SOX Platform UI Strategy & Mockup Framework
Multi-Tiered Interface Design for Different User Personas & Use Cases
Start with Excel-like interfaces users already know
Gradually introduce advanced features as users gain confidence
Full-featured dashboards for advanced users and executives

• Add SOX ribbon with AI assistant
Start simple, add complexity as users gain confidence
AI assistant provides guidance at every step
Consistent data model across all interfaces
Essential functions available on any device
